test.name: Verify that a meeting of an specific room is displayed on [Rooms List] schedule table after clicking on the search page
Verify that an specific room is displayed on [Rooms List] schedule table using the [Location] filter.
Verify that an specific room is displayed on [Rooms List] schedule table using the [Minimum Capacity] filter.
Verify that an specific room is displayed on [Rooms List] schedule table using the [Room Name] filter.
